newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: Australian All Ord's hits fresh high at 2,525.4.
newsitem.headline: Australian All Ord's hits fresh high at 2,525.4.

text.p: Australian stock market barometer the All Ordinaries index hit a new high of 2,525.4 in Friday afternoon trade, up 20.7 points on Thursday's close.
The previous record of 2,525.2 was hit on Wednesday this week.
